Write-Up Text: The Federal Budget for 2023 has been garnering attention as Aussies eagerly await the benefits. People will soon receive much-needed boosts to their finances including an increase to the Commonwealth Rent Assistance program cheaper childcare and energy bill relief. There is also money allocated to provide support for veterans more assistance for those on Jobseeker and cheaper medicines. Despite some misinformation the budget papers themselves highlight that family tax benefits and energy bill relief are achievable for eligible recipients. Overall the Federal Budget provides a glimmer of hope for many struggling Australians.
